title: Jurassic World Trilogy 4K Steelbooks Release This Week, Back In Stock At Amazon
description: Jurassic Park Trilogy - Limited Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $60 (was $65) | Releases June 17 See at Amazon See at Walmart Jurassic World Trilogy - Limited Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $60 (was $65) | Releases June 17 See at Amazon See at Walmart With Jurassic World Rebirth stomping its way into theaters on July 2, it's the perfect time to rewatch the series. To celebrate the arrival of the seventh film in the blockbuster action franchise, Universal Pictures is releasing a pair of collectible box sets compiling the original Jurassic Park Trilogy and the modern Jurassic World Trilogy. Both collections launch June 17 and come with three 4K Blu-ray discs, digital copies, and cool steelbook cases. Amazon has restocked the Jurassic Park Trilogy Steelbook and Jurassic World Trilogy Steelbook for $60 each.If you don't care about steelbooks but want to rewatch the series ahead of Jurassic World Rebirth, check out Amazon's limited-time deal discounting the Jurassic World 6-Movie Ultimate Collection on 4K Blu-ray to only $45 (was $100). All six Jurassic Park movies are available individually on 4K Blu-ray for $20 or less, too. All Jurassic Park and World 4K Blu-rays Jurassic Park Trilogy - Limited Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $60 (was $65) | Releases June 17 Jurassic Park Trilogy's Limited Edition Steelbook box set comes with 4K Blu-ray and digital editions of first three feature films in the franchise:Jurassic Park (1993)The Lost World: Jurassic Park (1997)Jurassic Park 3 (2001)The classic '90s action films starring Jeff Goldblum look awesome in 4K UHD resolution (2160p) with High Dynamic Range (HDR10 and Dolby Vision supported). On the audio side, the trilogy is enhanced by Dolby Atmos and Dolby TrueHD 7.1 surround sound.Along with the three films, the collection comes with some cool bonus content, including the six-part documentary series chronicling the process of adapting Jurassic Park into a movie.Jurassic Park Trilogy Special FeaturesReturn to Jurassic Park: A six-part documentary series on the making of the trilogyArchival featurettesBehind-the-scenes footageAudio commentaryDeleted scenesTheatrical trailersYou can check out a full list of special features at the bottom of this story. See at Amazon See at Walmart Jurassic World Trilogy - Limited Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $60 (was $65) | Releases June 17 The Jurassic World Trilogy's Limited Edition Steelbook box set comes with the three films in the sequel series starring Chris Pratt:Jurassic World (2015)Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018)Jurassic World Dominion (2022)Like the Jurassic Park Trilogy, each movie in this set is rendered in 4K resolution (2160p) and supports Dolby Vision and HDR10 visual enhancements as well as Dolby Atmos and and TrueHD 7.1 surround sound for immersive audio effects. The collection comes with all of the bonus content found on previous 4K editions of each film, which amounts to several hours of featurettes, cast and crew interviews, and more. Jurassic World Trilogy Special FeaturesIn-depth featurettesInterviews with the cast and crewBehind-the-scenes footageDeleted scenesThe full list of special features can be found at the bottom of this story. See at Amazon See at Walmart Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: All Outfits In Mario Kart World And How To Unlock Them
description: Mario Kart World gives you the option to switch up your style instead of forcing you to wear the same old overalls or dresses in every race. Outfits and costumes are mostly reserved for the major characters like Mario, Luigi, Peach, Daisy, etc. However, some side characters, such as King Boo and Shy Guy, also have a few different choices. Below, we'll show you every outfit in Mario Kart World and how to unlock them all.There are 50 Mario Kart World characters to unlock so far, and over 100 costumes spread between them all. Main characters like Mario tend to have up to 10 outfits, while characters like Lakitu have around two or three.To unlock new outfits, you need to eat specific food items. For example, Mario's Touring outfit is unlocked when you eat burgers while driving around as Mario. Eating food immediately puts the new outfit on your character and unlocks the outfit in the racer selection screen for future use. Some costumes can be unlocked through multiple foods, but we've listed all the ones we've confirmed.There are drive-through stations near several tracks where you'll see glowing take-out bags to the side of the road. Drive through those bags to pick up a food item, then use it to obtain a new outfit. The most efficient way to unlock all outfits is to enter Free Roam and go to the location that contains the food you want. Then, switch characters to eat that one food item multiple times, unlocking all outfits for the specific characters who need to eat the same food. For more details, check out our guide on how eating meals and unlocking costumes works.If you're looking to learn more about Mario Kart World, you can click the stories and guides below for more information:Mario Kart World Lets Players Rewind If They Make A MistakeHow To Get Speed Boosts In Mario Kart World - All MethodsBattle Mode Is Back In Mario Kart World, Two Minigames ConfirmedMario Kart World Isn't Telling You The Truth About Character And Vehicle StatsMario Kart World Features Giant Trucks And Boats You Can Use To Dominate Races Touring MarioThe Touring Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger, which can be found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line. Dune Rider MarioThe Dune Rider Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any food item from the Yoshi's drive-through in Desert Hills. Drive forward from the starting line and turn left off the main road to find the drive-through. Sightseeing MarioThe Sightseeing Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any pizza, ice cream, or fish and chips. Pizza can be found on Yoshi's trucks driving around Crown City. Ice Cream can be found by driving forward from the Crown City starting line, then turning right after passing the Warp Plaza building. Fish and chips can be found at a food truck in Koopa Troopa Beach if you turn left just before the starting line. Cowboy MarioThe Cowboy Mario outfit is unlocked by eating any snacks from the Yoshi's in Whistletop Summit. Turn left just before the starting line to find a Yoshi's drive-through hidden next to two item blocks. Aviator MarioThe Aviator Mario outfit is unlocked by eating an item from the food truck on the Airship Fortress. Drive forward from the starting line to board the airship. Then, turn right and drive to the highest area on that side of the ship to find Toad in a food truck with a Yoshi's sign above it. Mechanic MarioThe Mechanic Mario outfit is unlocked by eating a snack from the food truck at Dry Bones Burnout. Drive forward from the starting line and turn right to find Toad in a Yoshi's food truck. All-Terrain MarioThe All-Terrain Mario outfit is unlocked by eating donuts, which can be found on Choco Mountain or Peach Stadium. Yoshi's trucks drive around the Choco Mountain track, and they carry food items. And there's a food truck in the roundabout in front of the starting line at Peach Stadium that has donuts as well. Pro Racer MarioThe Pro Racer Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating cake at Peach Stadium. Drive forward from the starting line until you reach a roundabout with four food trucks in it. The truck on the northwest side has the cake you need. Happi MarioThe Happi Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating taiyaki or candied apples, and both food items are found at Cheep Cheep Falls. Drive past the starting line, then immediately turn around to see the food stalls higher up to your left. Touring LuigiThe Touring Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger or ice cream. Pizza is found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line, and ice cream can be found in Crown City next to the Warp Plaza building. Oasis LuigiThe Oasis Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating any food item from the Yoshi's drive-through in Desert Hills. Drive forward from the starting line and turn left off the main road to find the drive-through. Gondolier LuigiThe Gondolier Luigi outfit is unlocked by eating any pizza or snacks. Pizza can be found on Yoshi's trucks driving around Crown City. For the snacks, turn left just before the starting line in Whistletop Summit to find a Yoshi's drive-through hidden next to two item blocks. Mechanic LuigiThe Mechanic Luigi outfit is unlocked by eating a snack from the food truck at Dry Bones Burnout. Drive forward from the starting line and turn right to find Toad in a Yoshi's food truck. All-Terrain LuigiThe All-Terrain Luigi outfit is unlocked by eating donuts, which can be found on Choco Mountain or Peach Stadium. Yoshi's trucks drive around the Choco Mountain track, and they carry food items. And there's a food truck in the roundabout in front of the starting line at Peach Stadium that has donuts as well. Pro Racer LuigiThe Pro Racer Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating cake at Peach Stadium. Drive forward from the starting line until you reach a roundabout with four food trucks in it. The truck on the northwest side has the cake you want. Happi LuigiThe Happi Mario outfit can be unlocked by eating taiyaki or candied apples, and both food items are found at Cheep Cheep Falls. Drive past the starting line, then immediately turn around to see the food stalls higher up to your left. Farmer LuigiThe Farmer Luigi outfit can be unlocked by eating the soft-serve dessert from Moo Moo Meadows. As soon as you teleport to the location, turn right toward Peach Stadium and drive off-road. You'll see the Yoshi's drive-through on the other side of a large barn. Touring PeachThe Touring Peach outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger or ice cream. Pizza is found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line, and ice cream can be found in Crown City next to the Warp Plaza building. Vacation PeachThe Vacation Peach outfit is unlocked by eating Whistletop Summit snacks or any food item from the Yoshi's drive-through in Desert Hills. Drive forward from the Desert Hills starting line and turn left off the main road to find the drive-through. For the snacks, turn left just before the starting line in Whistletop Summit to find a Yoshi's drive-through hidden next to two item blocks. Sightseeing PeachThe Sightseeing Peach outfit can be unlocked by eating any pizza. Pizza can be found on Yoshi's trucks driving around Crown City. Then, turn right and drive to the highest area on that side of the ship to find Toad in a food truck with a Yoshi's sign above it. And there's a food truck in the roundabout in front of the starting line at Peach Stadium that has donuts as well. Pro Racer PeachThe Pro Racer Peach outfit can be unlocked by eating cake at Peach Stadium. Drive forward from the starting line until you reach a roundabout with four food trucks in it. The truck on the northwest side has the cake you need. Yukata PeachThe Yukata Peach outfit can be unlocked by eating taiyaki or candied apples, and both food items are found at Cheep Cheep Falls. Drive past the starting line, then immediately turn around to see the food stalls higher up to your left. All-Terrain Donkey KongThe All-Terrain Donkey Kong outfit can be unlocked by eating a burger or several other foods, since it's his only costume. Burgers can be found right next to the Mario Bros. Circuit starting line. Burger Bud ToadThe Burger Bud Toad outfit is unlocked by eating a burger or pizza. Burgers can be found right next to the Mario Bros. title: Ubisoft Still Working On That Prince Of Persia Remake That Was Announced In 2020
description: Remember that Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake Ubisoft announced back in 2020? The one that was supposed to launch four years ago? Well, itâ€™s still in development according to a new update from the publisher after the game was a no-show during Summer Game Fest. Read more...

title: Nintendo's Crackdown On Switch 2 Piracy Has Already Begun
description: It took hackers over a year to jailbreak the original Switch, but the Switch 2 has one vulnerability its predecessor didnâ€™t: backwards compatibility. title: FBC: Firebreak developers discuss the inspiration and challenges creating their first multiplayer title

We chatted with Communications Director Thomas Puha, Lead Level Designer Teemu Huhtiniemi, Lead Designer/Lead Technical Designer Anssi Hyytiainen, and Game Director/Lead Writer Mike Kayatta about some of the fascinating and often [â€¦]

title: Nintendo Switch 2 hackers say theyâ€™re already getting banned
description: The original Nintendo Switch had such a massive piracy problem, hackers were able to play new first-party games weeks before they were available to the public. Since its release in early June, hackers have wondered if the Switch 2 might have similar vulnerabilities, but early reports suggest that Nintendo has anticipated typical methods of meddling [â€¦]

title: Mario Kart World has more ways to dodge a blue shell than you realize
description: Doing well in Mario Kart World is the same as putting a target on your back when it comes to blue shells. For some, the combination of a high skill ceiling, tough NPCs, and prevalence of the spiny item has proven irksome, but it doesnâ€™t have to be this way. You have more tools in [â€¦]

title: After five tumultuous years, Ubisoft's Prince of Persia: Sands of Time remake is now "deep" in development
description: It's now been five years since Ubisoft's beleaguered Prince of Persia: Sands of Time remake was originally revealed, and a little over a year since the publisher last popped up to remind us all the project was still alive. But here we are again, 12 months on, with another brief update, this time letting fans know the remake remains "deep" in development. Read more

title: As much as it pains me to say it, the Switch 2's short battery life is a real bummer
description: Sometimes you just know something to be true. Do I want to eat a pizza right now? Yes. Is Hot Rod the greatest Transformer? Yes. Am I going to be miserable when the temperature climbs above 22 degrees celsius? Yes. Is my sleep going to suffer because of a big event happening tomorrow? Yes. Is the Switch 2's battery life too short? Yes. Read more
author: Tom Orry

title: Alienware price crash sale lands RTX 5070 Ti rig at just $1750, it's first time ever this low

author: Lloyd Coombes

title: End Of Abyss is a Dark Soulsy shooter spawned from the bowels of Little Nightmares
description: Early in my hands-on for End Of Abyss, the developer sitting next to me expressed surprise at how readily and consistently I was using the game's handheld scanner. I myself was surprised - perhaps even appalled - to hear that other journalists had been neglecting it. End Of Abyss, you see, takes place in an underground plate-metal labyrinth where every corner is a huddle of waiting shadows, every doorway a mystery, and every ventilation fan a web of fungal grot. I hate to cast aspersions on other members of the press, but you would have to be an absolute chowderhead to explore such a warren using your eyes alone. This is a world that feels like it's holding its breath. Read more

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 883
description: Soâ€¦what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isnâ€™t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. Nah, I just donâ€™t get the hype. 2. Whatâ€™s your favorite summer dessert? Hmm, all of them? If pressed to pick one, then ice cream. 3. Do you have plans for the Fourth of July yet? Connor will be dancing with her dance team in the town parade, so thatâ€™s our main event during the day. Weâ€™ll probably do a barbeque at home after the parade. Where we live doesnâ€™t allow fireworks, so we may or may not go looking for a fireworks display. Weâ€™ll see how ambitious weâ€™re feeling! 4. How do you feel about maxi dresses? title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 864
description: Heya, friend! Happy late Fatherâ€™s Day to ya! Hope you had a great one. Except for a brief drive out to visit the fam in the East Bay, we stayed around the house. But it was fun. Lots of high-intensity lounging, TV watching and chillaxinâ€™â€¦ Rosie, purr usual, spent the day working on her science experiments. That reminds meâ€¦ Tabs wasnâ€™t particularly interested in science or genetics like Rosie is, but he was interested in acting as a father figure to at-risk kittens and a mentor to up-and-coming kitty supermodels. Despite his busy schedule, he always made time for the kittens in his foundation. He would read to them, do homework with them, teach them how to strut and strike poses on the catwalk â€” all the basic life skills. Rosie Rosieâ€™s view of Fatherâ€™s Day is a little different. As an introverted, more science-minded cat, sheâ€™s more interested in the genetic aspects of parentage.
